--- In nihontostudy@yahoogroups.com, Richard Turner <ikkanshi@w...> wrote:
=
> fess up, what is the dumbest thing you have done with a blade.

I think I=
've mentioned this one before, but, hey, a little bit of
stupidity can go a=
 long way.  Once when leaving a hotel with three
swords wrapped up in a tow=
el, as I reached for the front door handle,
I inadvertantly tilted the uppe=
r tsuka ends down, and a wak started
sliding out of its saya onto the marbl=
e floor.  I made a wild grab for
it with my free hand, and got it - or, bet=
ter said, it got me.  The ha
near the habaki sliced vertically into the mid=
dle of my thumb, about a
third of the way up my fingernail.  The towel came=
 in handy.
